Text: I'd like to stop seeding, from now on. If we all seed just 1:1, give at least what you take, this torrent will never die. Enjoy the show :)
please seed for a while when you have finished downloading, give others the chance to watch this great film!
Thank you very much for this Great film! :)

Thanx 4 the up gwyx.
Will seed for some time.

Thanx very much for the upload & seeding.  It was a great flick -- I want to read the series!

I guess it's not likely, but I sure would like to see the rest of the novels done in the same stop-motion style.  Love the stuff!

Very decent quality too, considering the file size!
